= Building Qt version (windows, linux, mac, symbian touch) =

Download [http://developer.nokia.com/info/sw.nokia.com/id/da8df288-e615-443d-be5c-00c8a72435f8/Qt_SDK.html Nokia Qt SDK].

When installing it, select required components (desktop, mobile platforms, toolchains, etc).

[http://code.google.com/p/unrealspeccyp/source/checkout Checkout] source code.

Launch [http://qt.nokia.com/products/developer-tools Qt Creator].

Open project from file  unreal_speccy_portable/build/qt/unreal_speccy_portable.pro.

Select required platform, Debug or Release configuration.

Press Build & Run button.
